logoFingerprint.notes: The garment appears to be made of a satin-like material, which lends itself well to both the detailed embroidery and the smooth, vibrant sublimation on the hood lining. The contrasting textures of the decoration techniques add to the garment's appeal.

modelPose: Jacket snapped, showing both front script and silhouette â€” one arm raised to show sleeve detail. Hood up optional.
